basic_information.scholarship_notes: Awarding for the last time in Spring 2020 unless recipients don't use in academic year 2020-2021.

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a career in teaching. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any student majoring in education & preparing to become a teacher Must be a junior or senior Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
